title: Creating a reading list of articles on information extraction from the web, particularly focusing on unstructured and semi-structured documents, involves selecting a mix of foundational and contemporary works. Hereâ€™s a list of 20 articles and papers up to 2020 that cover various approaches and methodologies in this field
**"Information Extraction from the Internet: A Survey"**
- A comprehensive survey of early methods in web information extraction
**"Wrapper Induction for Information Extraction"** by Nicholas Kushmerick
- A seminal work on using machine learning to create wrappers for extracting information from web pages
**"RoadRunner: Towards Automatic Data Extraction from Large Web Sites"** by V
- Discusses a system for automatic data extraction from web pages
- Introduces a method for extracting data using tree alignment techniques
**"TextRunner: Open Information Extraction on the Web"** by Michele Banko et al
- Describes an open information extraction system that processes web-scale text
**"Unsupervised Information Extraction by Text Segmentation"** by William W
- Explores unsupervised methods for segmenting and extracting information from text
**"Wrapper Maintenance: A Machine Learning Approach"** by I
note: - Focuses on maintaining wrappers for information extraction as web pages change.

title: **"DeepDive: A Data Management System for Automatic Knowledge Base Construction"** by Ce Zhang et al
- Discusses a system that integrates information extraction with data management
**"Bootstrapping Named Entity Recognition in the Biomedical Domain"** by Burr Settles
note: - Examines bootstrapping techniques for extracting named entities from unstructured text.

title: **"Open Information Extraction from the Web"** by Oren Etzioni et al
- Introduces the concept of open information extraction and its application to web data
Bootstrapping Data from the Web"** by Sergey Brin
- A classic paper on using bootstrapping for extracting structured data from the web
**"Information Extraction from Semi-Structured Web Pages by Pattern Discovery"** by Yanhong Zhai and Bing Liu
- Discusses pattern discovery techniques for semi-structured data extraction
**"Learning to Extract Formatted Data from the Web"** by H
note: - Focuses on learning-based approaches for extracting formatted data.

title: **"Wrapper Generation for Semi-Structured Internet Sources"** by I
note: - Explores methods for generating wrappers for semi-structured data.

title: **"Ontology-Based Information Extraction with OntoSyphon"** by Philipp Cimiano et al
- Discusses using ontologies to guide information extraction processes
**"A Survey of Web Information Extraction Systems"** by A. Laender et al
- Provides an overview of various systems developed for web information extraction
**"Information Extraction from Web Pages Using Machine Learning"** by S
- Reviews machine learning techniques applied to web information extraction
**"Automatic Wrapper Adaptation by Tree Edit Distance Matching"** by A
- Introduces a method for adapting wrappers using tree edit distance
**"WebTables: Exploring the Power of Tables on the Web"**
- Discusses extracting and utilizing tabular data from web pages
**"Joint Extraction of Events and Entities within a Document Context"** by Limin Yao
- Explores joint extraction techniques for events and entities
These articles provide a broad overview of the field, covering both traditional and modern approaches to information extraction from web data
